name: Timothy J. H. Hele
tagline: Theoretical Chemistry Research Fellow at Cambridge University
body:
I research the motion of particles affected by quantum mechanics and how physical properties such as reaction rates can be calculated for them.

### Biography ###
* 2007-2011 MChem Chemistry at [Exeter College](www.exeter.ox.ac.uk), [University of Oxford](www.ox.ac.uk).
* 2011-2014 PhD \(Theoretical Chemistry\) at [Trinity College](www.trin.cam.ac.uk), [University of Cambridge](www.cam.ac.uk). Derived [Quantum Transition-State Theory](http://arxiv.org/abs/1408.0996)
* 2014-2017 Research Fellowship, [Jesus College](www.jesus.cam.ac.uk), University of Cambridge.

This page is currently under construction, but feel free to examine my research on [google scholar](http://scholar.google.co.uk/citations?user=DH0CmqMAAAAJ&hl=en) in the meantime. Should you require further information, I can be contacted at tjhh2 {at} cam.ac.uk.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
